title: Restore Add User button on Users page

requirements.summary: Add an 'Add User' button to the Users page header area that opens the existing AddUserInfoDialog for admin users
acceptanceCriteria: An 'Add User' button is visible in the Users page header area when logged in as an admin
Clicking the button opens the AddUserInfoDialog (or equivalent user creation dialog)
The button is only shown to users with admin role (role-gated)
No other changes are made to the Users page layout or functionality

file_operations.description: Add an 'Add User' button to the page header area alongside the existing Refresh button. Gate the button visibility to admin users only using the authorization component's role check. Wire the button to open the AddUserInfoDialog when clicked. Ensure the button follows the existing UI patterns (styling, spacing) seen with the Refresh button. Verify the authorization component's usage instructions for proper role-gating implementation.
